concept.label: first-question
concept.phrase: I remember in the <font color="blue">past</font>, when I had <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> I did <font color="blue">"%prev_i%"</font> and you said it was correct. (see <font color="blue">Figure A</font>). <font color="red">Now</font>, I see <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> so I thought <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> would work here, but you said that is incorrect. (see <font color="red">Figure B</font>) . Why? Please explain your reasoning in the box below.

concept.label: R2Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Fantastic! Thanks!
That's a helpful response. Thanks!
Perfect! You are one of the best teachers I had so far!
You're a fantastic teacher!
Makes perfect sense to me. Thank you!
Genius! That helped a lot!
Sweet! Explanation right on spot!
Thanks for explaining using the key terms. That’s very helpful!
What a smart teacher I have! Thanks for explaining it so clearly!
You are really good at explaining things to me!
Thanks for caring about my learning. Your explanations are quite helpful!

concept.label: R2N-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am looking for an in-depth answer. Using the key terms in Unit Overview tab, please explain why <font color="blue">"%prev_i%"</font> worked in <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> but <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> does not work in <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font>?

I am trying to understand in-depth. Can you explain why <font color="blue">"%prev_i%"</font> worked in <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> but <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> does not work in <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab?

I am thinking deeply about what you just said, but I need more information. Using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab, please explain the core difference between <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> and <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> that made <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> wrong?

concept.label: R1Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Thanks for describing it so thoughtfully!
Thanks for the witty response!
Thanks for explaining it to me so wisely!
Your explanation was right on spot!

concept.label: R1N-response-simst
concept.phrase: I see! Please explain what went wrong using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab.
How did you figure out that something went wrong? Please explain using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab.
Please explain what went wrong using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab.
Please describe what went wrong using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab.

concept.label: R0-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am trying to understand what makes <font color="blue">"%prev_i%"</font> correct for <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> but <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> incorrect for <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font>. Please explain using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab.
Can you please explain why <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> is wrong when the equation is <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?

I attempt to learn things deeply so that I can solve any equation. Which part of <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> motivated you to say <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> is wrong and why? Please explain using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab.

I want to solidify my basics. I failed to see how <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> and <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> are different. Can you explain it to me using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?

I want to strengthen my basic understanding. Using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab, please explain how <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> and <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> are different that makes <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> wrong?

concept.label: R0-response-simst-2
concept.phrase: Still no luck for me! Would you try one more time to explain why <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> is wrong using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?
I am still in doubt! Please explain the difference between <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font> and <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> using the key terms in Unit Overview tab?

Let's concentrate on the differences between <font color="red">"%current_problem%"</font> and <font color="blue">"%prev_problem%"</font>. What makes <font color="red">"%current_i%"</font> wrong now? Please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.

concept.label: move-on
concept.phrase: Hmm...I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on for now!
Umm...I am not very sure if I understand your explanation correctly. I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on now!
Although I am not convinced yet, let’s move on for now!
Hmm..I still have some confusions, I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on for now!
Umm..I did not quite get what you said but let me move on for now! I will get back to it later again.

concept.label: rephrase
concept.phrase: I did not get that. Can you please rephrase what you said?
That was hard to understand. Can you please rephrase what you said?
I'm afraid I don't follow you. Can you please rephrase what you said?
Sorry, I didn't catch that. Would you mind rephrasing what you said?
That was all Greek to me. Can you please rephrase what you said?

concept.label: unanticipated-response
concept.phrase: anything else
